genresAdvancedInfo.name: brasilia indie
genresAdvancedInfo.description: A genre of music that blends traditional Brazilian rhythms and instruments with indie rock and pop influences. It emerged in the late 2000s as a response to the dominance of mainstream Brazilian music, and is characterized by its catchy melodies, upbeat rhythms, and eclectic instrumentation. It often features lyrics that address social and political issues, as well as personal experiences.
